name: INDI for Java

screenshots.caption: Very simple Graphical Java INDI Client

short_description:
A Java library implementing the INDI distributed control protocol (http://indilib.org). Designed to easily implement new INDI Clients (graphical and not graphical ones), INDI Drivers and INDI Servers.
We have started a complete overall of the project with many more drivers the staging site with the current development state can be found here http://indiforjava.sourceforge.net/stage/
summary: INDI astronomical device control library for Java
